articles.title: Twitter to Warn Users Attempting to Like Censored Posts - Breitbart
articles.description: Twitter is taking its campaign of labeling tweets that the site believes contain "misinformation" about the 2020 election to the next level. Now the platform plans to send users warnings if they attempt to "like" labeled tweets.
